html:
Oct 28, 2024

[[read-time]] min read

You can now purchase a refurbished Pixel phone — the closest thing to a new Pixel — for up to 40% off the original retail price at the Google Store.

Starting today, you can purchase refurbished Pixel phones through our new Certified Refurbished Phone program in the U.S. For the first time ever, this provides more sustainable and affordable choices when it comes to Pixel phones. Shop previous generations of Pixel phones — from the Pixel 6 series onward — priced up to 40% off of the original retail price exclusively at the Google Store.

Pixel phones that are inspected, certified and ready to go

What makes a phone a Certified Refurbished Pixel? We carefully inspect the battery, housing, and screens for any imperfections. If any phones need work, our technicians only use authentic Google parts for the repairs. Each phone gets the latest Android software before being packaged in a new box, and comes with a compatible charger. The result is a Pixel phone that’s as close to new as possible.

These phones also come with the same one-year limited warranty and full customer support that we offer on a new Pixel phone, so you can have peace of mind with your refurbished Pixel.

Choose from more sustainable options

Since launching our first hardware products, sustainability has been integrated into everything we do — from sourcing materials to designing our retail stores. The Certified Refurbished Phone program is the latest in our efforts to continue our sustainability goals, including reducing electronic waste.

Today, all new Pixel, Fitbit, and Nest devices come with 100% plastic-free packaging. Pre-loved Pixel phones shouldn’t be any different, so we’ve made sure all packaging for refurbished phones is also 100% plastic-free.

Find your pre-loved Pixel

Discover the full selection of Certified Refurbished phones only at the Google Store, including Pixel 7 Pro, Pixel 7, Pixel 6 Pro, Pixel 6, and Pixel 6a. We’re constantly updating our selection of devices, so check back soon if you don’t see a generation you’re interested in now.

When you purchase your Certified Refurbished phone through the Google Store, you’ll get free shipping and returns, plus access to all the authentic accessories you need to make the most of your nearly-new phone. With Google Store Financing, you can get your refurbished Pixel at 0% APR for up to 36 months.

Like all Pixel phones, these refurbished phones get better over time. The refurbished Pixel phones come with the latest software updates right out of the box. And you’ll continue to get access to the latest features through our regular Pixel Drops.

Don't miss out on a chance to own a Pixel phone that feels like new at a fraction of the original price.
